H0.text: What is the more common name for the disease variola. Smallpox

H1.text: What is the more common name for the disease variola. Cowpox

H2.text: What is the more common name for the disease variola. Chickenpox

H3.text: What is the more common name for the disease variola. Variola

A4.text: variola major was the primary cause of smallpox outbreaks across Asia and most of Africa.

A5.text: This form of variola major was more easily confused with chickenpox.
